ComicInfo.Title: Lest the Heavens Perish!; I... This Hammer! (Or, If You Knew Uru Like We Knew Uru!); Who Shall Be Worthy?; The Heart of a Hero!; When Volstagg Was In Flower!; When Warriors Clasp!; Evil Aborning
ComicInfo.Summary:
Page on the characters who've lifted the hammer.
Page on Thor's romantic leads.
Tongue-in-cheek story of Thor and Hercules arm-wrestling.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:32:35. [Issue ID 45885]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
